message.content:
{
  "itinerary": [
    {
      "day": 1,
      "activities": [
        {
          "title": "Morning: Visit the Colosseum and Roman Forum",
          "time": "Morning",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Explore the iconic Colosseum, the largest amphitheater ever built, followed by a walk through the ancient Roman Forum to understand the heart of ancient Rome's social and political life.",
          "bookingUrl": "https://www.coopculture.it/en/ticket_office.cfm",
          "location": "Piazza del Colosseo, 1, 00184 Rome",
          "notes": "Book tickets in advance to avoid long lines."
        },
        {
          "title": "Lunch: Authentic Roman Pizza",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "1 hour",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Enjoy a delicious Roman-style pizza at a local pizzeria known for thin crust and fresh ingredients.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Pizzeria Ai Marmi, Viale di Trastevere, 53, 00153 Rome",
          "notes": "Try the classic Margherita or Pizza Bianca."
        },
        {
          "title": "Afternoon: Capitoline Museums",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Visit the Capitoline Museums which house an extensive collection of art and artifacts from ancient Rome, including famous sculptures and Renaissance art.",
          "bookingUrl": "https://museicapitolini.org/en",
          "location": "Piazza del Campidoglio, 1, 00186 Rome",
          "notes": "Accessible by foot from the Roman Forum area."
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "day": 2,
      "activities": [
        {
          "title": "Morning: Vatican Museums and Sistine Chapel",
          "time": "Morning",
          "duration": "4 hours",
          "priceRange": "$$$",
          "description": "Explore the Vatican Museums, home to one of the world's most impressive art collections, and marvel at Michelangelo's Sistine Chapel ceiling.",
          "bookingUrl": "https://www.museivaticani.va/content/museivaticani/en.html",
          "location": "Viale Vaticano, 00165 Rome",
          "notes": "Book 'skip the line' tickets in advance; arrive early."
        },
        {
          "title": "Lunch: Traditional Roman Lunch",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "1 hour",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Savor classic Roman pasta dishes like Carbonara or Amatriciana at a nearby trattoria.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Trattoria da Enzo al 29, Via dei Vascellari, 29, 00153 Rome",
          "notes": "Arrive early or book ahead as it’s popular."
        },
        {
          "title": "Afternoon: St. Peter's Basilica and Square",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "Free-$",
          "description": "Visit St. Peter's Basilica to admire its stunning architecture and artwork, then relax or people-watch in the famous St. Peter's Square.",
          "bookingUrl": "https://www.vatican.va/various/basiliche/san_pietro/index_it.htm",
          "location": "Piazza San Pietro, 00120 Vatican City",
          "notes": "Free entrance; consider climbing the dome for a fee."
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "day": 3,
      "activities": [
        {
          "title": "Morning: Galleria Borghese Art Museum",
          "time": "Morning",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "$$$",
          "description": "Admire Bernardini, Caravaggio, Raphael, and other masterpieces in the beautiful park setting of Villa Borghese.",
          "bookingUrl": "https://www.galleriaborghese.beniculturali.it/en",
          "location": "Piazzale Scipione Borghese, 5, 00197 Rome",
          "notes": "Timed entry tickets required."
        },
        {
          "title": "Lunch: Pizza at a Traditional Roman Pizzeria",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "1 hour",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Enjoy pizza in a local favorite spot known for its wood-fired oven pizzas.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Pizzeria La Montecarlo, Vicolo Savelli, 13, 00186 Rome",
          "notes": "Try the pizza al taglio style."
        },
        {
          "title": "Afternoon: Walk Through Historic Center and Pantheon",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "Free",
          "description": "Stroll through Rome's historic center, visiting key landmarks including the Pantheon, Piazza Navona, and the Trevi Fountain.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Pantheon, Piazza della Rotonda, 00186 Rome",
          "notes": "Bring comfortable shoes and stay hydrated."
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "day": 4,
      "activities": [
        {
          "title": "Morning: Explore Trastevere Neighborhood",
          "time": "Morning",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "Free-$",
          "description": "Discover the charming streets and squares of Trastevere, with historic churches and street art.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Trastevere, Rome",
          "notes": "Great for photography and local vibe."
        },
        {
          "title": "Lunch: Trattoria Lunch with Roman Specialties",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "1 hour",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Dine on traditional Roman dishes such as saltimbocca or cacio e pepe.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Osteria der Belli, Via di San Francesco a Ripa, 158, 00153 Rome",
          "notes": "Offers good selection of local wines."
        },
        {
          "title": "Afternoon: Janiculum Hill and Villa Farnesina",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Visit Villa Farnesina, famous for Renaissance art, followed by panoramic views from Janiculum Hill.",
          "bookingUrl": "https://museivillatorlonia.it/eng/home-eng/",
          "location": "Via della Lungara, 230, 00165 Rome",
          "notes": "Perfect for sunset views."
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "day": 5,
      "activities": [
        {
          "title": "Morning: Baths of Caracalla",
          "time": "Morning",
          "duration": "2 hours",
          "priceRange": "$",
          "description": "Explore the vast ruins of the ancient Roman Baths, showcasing the grandeur of Roman engineering.",
          "bookingUrl": "https://parcocolosseo.it/en/areas/baths-of-caracalla/",
          "location": "Viale delle Terme di Caracalla, 00153 Rome",
          "notes": "Less crowded in the morning."
        },
        {
          "title": "Lunch: Casual Eatery with Artisanal Pizza",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "1 hour",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Try a gourmet pizza made with fresh, local ingredients.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Pizzarium Bonci, Via della Meloria, 43, 00136 Rome",
          "notes": "Known for creative toppings."
        },
        {
          "title": "Afternoon: Visit MAXXI - National Museum of 21st Century Arts",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "See contemporary art exhibitions at MAXXI, Rome’s museum dedicated to modern art and architecture.",
          "bookingUrl": "https://www.maxxi.art/en/",
          "location": "Via Guido Reni, 4A, 00196 Rome",
          "notes": "Great contrast to ancient art in Rome."
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "day": 6,
      "activities": [
        {
          "title": "Morning: Walk Around Piazza Venezia and Capitoline Hill",
          "time": "Morning",
          "duration": "2 hours",
          "priceRange": "Free",
          "description": "Enjoy a walking visit around Piazza Venezia, including the Victor Emmanuel II Monument and views over the historic center from Capitoline Hill.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Piazza Venezia, Rome",
          "notes": "Good photo opportunities and people-watching."
        },
        {
          "title": "Lunch: Last Roman Pizza Feast",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "1 hour",
          "priceRange": "$$",
          "description": "Celebrate your final day by enjoying classic Roman pizza at a renowned pizzeria.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Li Rioni, Via dei Tribunali, 46, 00184 Rome",
          "notes": "Popular for authentic Roman flavors."
        },
        {
          "title": "Afternoon: Relax at Villa Borghese Gardens",
          "time": "Afternoon",
          "duration": "3 hours",
          "priceRange": "Free",
          "description": "Spend your final afternoon relaxing in the beautiful Villa Borghese Gardens, renting a bike or rowing a boat on the little lake.",
          "bookingUrl": "",
          "location": "Piazzale Napoleone I, 00197 Rome",
          "notes": "Ideal to unwind before departure."
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
